The Quranic researcher said to him: If we are a bones, a definite bones are sure to deny the mission of the male state of the exile.And the worker in "if" is a host that is indicated by "Maridodon", meaning: if we were bones with a gateway, we respond and send with his being, something We were "by dropping the thunderbolt of the question, and it was said: It will be a mockery after the denial understanding, and it is shown that it is attached to" Omar, Abi, Abdullah, Ibn Al -Zubayr and Ibn Abbas, Mesareq, Mujahid, the Brotherhood, and Abu Bakr: “Naqra” are “with a thousand, and it is a slander of the latter of the bone.That is, my heart has become the most beautiful wind, and a hearing is heard for him; That is: a voice, and the most frequent readings; They were stated that a verb is more informed of an actor, even if it was more forever, and their saying: the increase of the building is indicated by the increase in the meaning of the meaning, or if it is not the same, or if it is not the same, or if it is not.As if he was an active active name, and he did a similar row, that reader was blessed or woke up with the heads of the verse and its choices for that is not beneficial to its union with the other The rhetoric of the greatest gold, and the ritual was interpreted by the most intense, and Amr ibn al -Alaa said: The height that was not bored, and the latter, the one who did not come, And the meaning of the meaning was transferred from Al -Farah, Abu Ubaidah, Abi Hatim and others,
